(9051x1+0)/1 mod 32768 = 9051. (9051x3+1)/2 mod 16384 = 13577. (9051x9+5)/4 mod 8192 = 3982. (9051x9+5)/8 mod 4096 = 1991. (9051x27+23)/16 mod 2048 = 939. (9051x81+85)/32 mod 1024 = 385. (9051x243+287)/64 mod 512 = 66. (9051x243+287)/128 mod 256 = 33. (9051x729+989)/256 mod 128 = 50. (9051x729+989)/512 mod 64 = 25. (9051x2187+3479)/1024 mod 32 = 6. (9051x2187+3479)/2048 mod 16 = 3. (9051x6561+12485)/4096 mod 8 = 5. (9051x19683+41551)/8192 mod 4 = 0. (9051x19683+41551)/16384 mod 2 = 0. (9051x19683+41551)/32768 mod 1 = 0.
